Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Busulfan levels were measured by a gas chromatographic - mass spectrometry assay in the plasma and cerebrospinal fluid of 9 children without central nervous system disease under 600 mg / m2 busulfan with clonazepam : busulfan cerebrospinal fluid : plasma ratio was 1 . 39 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Central Nervous System Disease |

The paragraph mentions "children without central nervous system disease." Therefore, Central Nervous System Disease is the entity that can be identified as a disease in this paragraph.
